**Contact:** Gian Marco DeMeis (Admin)

Fax: 6139999999

**Tender Description:**

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals for a tender related to Recall & Cancel of awards and amendments as well as verifying entries (Post Amendment #2) through SSC UAT Tender 8 - Recall & Cancel EN (Post Amendment #2) - Amendment 002.

The procurement will be carried out according to the  Canada-Korea Telecommunications Equipment Agreement (CKTEA).
